0: Beautiful hotel clean updated very luxurious
The Westin itself has a good 35 4 star experience rooms have been updated and are very god but some facilities are a bit behind and the staff is very friendly professional and caring
Was pleasantly surprised to find this hotel has undergone a recent refresh
The room was nice and newly remodeled
We were assigned 1201 which was very clean with crisp fresh bedding excellent air conditioning an updated bathroom and a very small mini fridge but no microwave
The rooms are well maintained with comfortable beds clean updated bathrooms and decent amenities
The hotel has been recently updated and the rooms are very spacious
The STAFF AWESOME VERY INFORMATIVE AND FRIENDLYThe mattresses need updated
1: We had to call maintenance to repair it but the way he rigged it caused water to spray all over the floor causing a flood
Parking is expensive and some of our group had their tires slashed overnight but hotel had them repaired
Hotel clearly needed some things to be updated fixed
The room was clean but some of the fixtures could use an update
Once you start looking around you can tell they are slacking on a lot of the maintenance
Door did n’t work upon arrival and and the Maintenance Man was the only person who was friendly about the ordeal
Room needs maintenance I stayed there a few years ago and everything was very new and clean this year you can tell everything in the room is wore out
I am not a complainer and very ‘ low maintenance ’ as a hotel guest
When I called the very busy front desk they had someone up to the room for repairs in less than 10 minutes
